parse
cmp base.ts base_expected
cmp ubuntu.ts ubuntu_expected

-- Dockerfile --
FROM alpine as base 

RUN apk add git

FROM ubuntu

COPY --from=base /test /test

-- base_expected --
import { Stage } from "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rumpl/typebuild-node/main/index.ts";

const base = new Stage("base", "alpine");

export default base
  .run("apk add git");

-- ubuntu_expected --
import { Stage } from "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rumpl/typebuild-node/main/index.ts";

import base from "./base.ts";

const ubuntu = new Stage("ubuntu", "ubuntu");

export default ubuntu
  .copy({
    from: base,
    source: "/test",
    destination: "/test"
  });
